glsa.title: LibXfont: Multiple integer overflows
glsa.synopsis: A buffer overflow was discovered in the PCF font parser, potentially resulting in the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: libXfont is the X.Org Xfont library, some parts are based on the FreeType code base.

description.p: Several integer overflows have been found in the PCF font parser.

impact.p: A local attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code or crash the Xserver by enticing a user to load a specially crafted PCF font file.

workaround.p: Do not use untrusted PCF Font files.

resolution.p: All libXfont users should upgrade to the latest version:
